last_episode_to_air.name: Scurry Stories
last_episode_to_air.overview: Chozen and his crew go busting after a legendary ghost said to haunt campus.

name: Chozen
overview: An animated comedy about its title character, "Chozen," a gay white rapper fresh out of prison. Armed with a new message, Chozen is on a quest for redemption and to claim his rightful position as the world's top rap artist. His music and lyrics take aim at the stereotypes of machismo and misogyny that is synonymous with rap music. And his new world view has been shaped by his time in prison.

episodes.name: "Pilot"
episodes.overview: An aspiring rapper tries to get his life back on track after being released from prison.

episodes.name: "Love & Bottlerockets"
episodes.overview: Chozen takes action when he suspects Tracy's boyfriend is cheating on her.

episodes.name: "Beef"
episodes.overview: A surprising job offer reunites Chozen with an old enemy.

episodes.name: Da Director
episodes.overview: Tracy and Chozen collaborate on a video while Ricky and Crisco attempt to get Troy laid.

episodes.name: Laced
episodes.overview: An old flame comes between Chozen and the band as they prepare to perform at an exclusive party.

episodes.name: "I'm With the Contraband"
episodes.overview: Chozen launches a criminal enterprise at the university.

episodes.name: Family Weekend (or How Gary Got His Groove Back)
episodes.overview: A campus visit turns into an unforgettable night for Chozen and Tracy's parents.

episodes.name: Boy's Night
episodes.overview: Chozen and Hunter hit the hottest club in town, while Ricky and Crisco try to get exposure for their new song.

episodes.name: In a Pickle
episodes.overview: A big opportunity in children's television threatens the band's hip hop future.

episodes.name: The Battle of Broken Spear
episodes.overview: At the summer's biggest music festival, Chozen confronts his past and goes head-to-head with Phantasm.

episodes.name: Sell, Sell, Sell
episodes.overview: Back in the comfort of prison, Chozen confronts a new enemy.

episodes.name: Soul Patch
episodes.overview: After an unfortunate series of events, Phantasm quits the rap game and finds love in a small town.

episodes.name: Scurry Stories
episodes.overview: Chozen and his crew go busting after a legendary ghost said to haunt campus.
